synopsis.text: Phantasy Star Online 2's official web manga, Puso Ni Comi, comes to life in this delightful anime adaptation! Join the ARKS force members as they navigate through their casual, light-hearted daily routines both in-game and offline. This comedic series highlights various gameplay elements while showcasing the unique quirks of the gaming community, offering an entertaining glimpse into the world of Phantasy Star Online 2. Prepare for laughter and camaraderie in this engaging portrayal of the not-so-serious side of ARKS force members' lives!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
